data.title: CV OSCAR Amended new 3 (2) (2)
data.meta_description: CV OSCAR Amended new 3 (2) (2) - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. 1 NAME : Oscar Mutwasi. DATE OF BIRTH : 11TH September 1974. PLACE OF BIRTH : Kakamega County. NATIONALITY : Kenyan. PASSPORT NUMBER : A783386 I. D. NUMBER : 12998809 MARITAL STATUS : Married. RELIGION : Christian. LANGUAGES : Kiswahili and English. CONTACT ADDRESS : P.O. BOX 10382- 00200, Nairobi. Mobile – +254 722 673 141. E mail address - mutwasioscar@yahoo.com CAREER AMBITION AND OBJECTIVE. -Pursue a career in new imaging modalities particularly MRI & CT and Health Care Management. -Offer maximum support to institutions and organizations in order to realize quality and maximum Product compliance to international standards. VALUES. -Honest service to the employer. -Respect and understand my colleagues at work. -Face and surmount challenges in the course of duty to my ultimate satisfaction. CURRICULUMVITAE. PERSONAL DETAILS

2. 2 -r 2008 – 2010 -: Strathmore Business school – Diploma in Advanced Health Management (AHMP) 2005 – 2006-: Institute of professional Studies – Certificate in Human Resource Management. 1996-1998 -: Kenya Medical Training College - Diploma in Diagnostic Radiography (DDR) - Certificate in first Aid. 1989-1992 -: Kivaywa High School - Secondary school education obtained Kenya Certificate of secondary Education (K.C.S.E) with An aggregate grade of C+ (plus). 1981-1988 -: Mushiangubu Primary School - Primary School Education .Obtained Kenya Certificate of Primary Education with a score of 53 Points  Seven Seas Technologies  01/01/2012 – 29/08 2015: Seven Seas Technologies. Position: 1. Head of sales Ge Modalities. 2. CT/MRI & Molecular Imaging Business Development Officer.  : Medanta Africare Limited. Position: 1. Senior CT Scan & MRI Technologist. 2. Nairobi Region Radiology Marketing Manager.  01/07/ 2011 –Nov 2011 : Nairobi West Hospital, Upper hill Radiology centre & Alliance Medical Centre. Position: Locum Radiographer. (General Radiography & CT Scanning.  2010 Nov. – 28/05/ 2011 : King Faisal Hospital, Kigali (RWANDA) Position: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Technologist & MRI In charge Technologist.  2010 Sept. – 2010 November : Upper hill Radiology Center (URC) Position: Technologist in Charge of General X- ray and Fluoroscopy, Ultrasound & CT scan Sections.  2010 – (July & August) Mediheal Hospital & Fertility centre. Position: MRI Technologist. EDUCATION BACKGROUND PROFFESIONAL SKILLS

3. 3  1999 – April 2010 : Aga Khan Hospital Nairobi, Radiology Department.  Conversant with ms word, ms excel ms power point and ms outlook computer software packages. Positions held 1. RADIOLOGY SALES MANAGER (NAIROBI REGION) – 2012 – TO DATE. Responsilities  Coordinating, supervising and ensuring that the business development plan for Nairobi region is fully executed by the marketing team.  Planning and budgeting for the radiology marketing team.  Resolve customer complaints regarding sales and service.  Monitor customer preferences to determine focus of sales efforts.  Direct and coordinate activities involving sales of services, commodities, real estate or other subjects of sale.  Determine price schedules and discount rates.  Review operational records and reports to project sales and determine profitability.  Direct, coordinate, and review activities in sales and service accounting and recordkeeping, and in receiving. 2. RADIOLOGY MANAGER – 2007 - 2010. Responsilities.  Administrative management of the entire radiology department. I.e.Ultasound Section, CT scanning section, MRI section General radiography and Nuclear Medicine section.  Ensure appropriate training and staffing in the entire department for maximum productivity.  Ensuring that all the staff have gone through all the required trainings to ensure all the safe clinical & medical practices are adhered to.  Work with the hospital administration to ensure that all the licensing and legal practicing requirements are in place for the smooth provision of the services.

4. 4  Ensure that all the machines services and calibrations are done on schedule to ensure accurate and reliable output. 2. SENIOR RADIOGRAPHER. Responsibilities. o Provision of high quality radiographic services in a timely and effective manner. o Booking, preparing and performing specialized procedures on patients. o Performing Computerized Tomography (C.T.) procedures using a 16 Slice spiral C.T. machine. o Planning rotation for Radiographers and also students coming in the Department for practical attachment o Organization of the continuous medical education programme for the Radiology department. o Carrying out Magnetic Resonance Imaging (M.R.I.) procedures at the M.R.I. center. o Training the junior Technologists in new Imaging modalities particularly CT & MRI OTHER PROFFESIONALAND SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITIES. 1 - Member Kenya Association of Radiographers – Registration number – 0302. 2 - Committee member Radiographers scientific conference committee (RASCO). 3 - Chairperson Fund Raising Committee Kenya association of Radiographers. 4 - Formerly Vice Chairman Kenya Association o Radiographers. 5 - Council member for Kenya association of Radiographers for five years. 6 – Licensed by Radiation Protection Board. (RPB) REFEREES
